txt.en: Within the ruins of Stormwall, cold-worms have begun building icy walls within the vacant lair of Etterfang….\n\nYour mission is to clear out ice walls within the ruins of Stormwall.
You have been tasked with clearing out ice walls within the ruins of Stormwall.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from Stormwall. They have found the old ruins partially encased in ice! Unfortunately, the group was running short on time and supplies, else they would have begun to chisel through the ice. We must return to properly clean up site.

'This can only be the work of the Frost-horde and for that, it can not stand!'
You must find a way to breach a barrier to reach your mission objective.
Your mission is to clear out ice walls within the ruins of Stormwall.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Stormwall.

'Well done! That should send a message that Stormwall does not belong to the Frost-horde! We may need to return to Stormwall often, to keep our hold upon the ruins. I fear the Frost-horde will return sooner than later!'
